description: bonnet with pointed top and long sides and back; black fabric printed with red flowers at back; front and top are black with embroidered red and green geometricized flowers, trimmed with zipper and embellished with various styles of buttons and white beads; colored beads around bottom edge of pointed top of maroon printed fabric
dimension: 19 7/8 x 22 9/16 in. (50.48 x 57.31 cm) (without top bead pompon)
markings: at bottom front corner, on cloth tag: [A30]
title: Hat
